GK20mmatvipu:321: Kapālī - paśyantu paśyantu māheśvarāḥ / eṣa duṣṭabhikṣunāmadhārako {nāgaseno DF} mama bhikṣākapālaṃ muṣitvā svayam evākrandati / bhavatu,
GK20mmatvipu:326: Kapālī - bho babhrukalpa! duṣṭabhikṣunāmadhārako nāgaseno mama bhikṣākapālaṃ corayitvā dātuṃ necchati /
GK20mmatvipu:327: Pāśupataḥ - (ātmagatam) {aye! D} yad asmābhir anuṣṭheyaṃ, gandharvaiḥ tad anuṣṭhitam / eṣa durātmā,
GK20mmatvipu:333: bho nāgasena! apy evam etad, yathāyam āha /
GK20mmatvipu:334: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - bhaavaṃ! tuvaṃ pi evaṃ bhaṇāsi / ādiṇṇādāṇā veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / mudhāvādā veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / {abbamhacayyā :
GK20mmatvipu:337: A} veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / pāṇādipādā veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / {akālabhoaṇā :
GK20mmatvipu:338: bhoaṇakālattherā KaAF} veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / ahmāaṃ buddhadhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:340_0: api na jānāsi G} / adattādānād viramanaṃ śikṣāpadam / mṛṣāvādād viramanaṃ śikṣāpadam /
GK20mmatvipu:340_1: abrahmacaryād viramanaṃ śikṣāpadam / prāṇātipātād viramanaṃ śikṣāpadam / akālabhojanād
GK20mmatvipu:342: Pāśupataḥ - satyasoma! īdṛśa eṣāṃ samayaḥ / kim atra prativacanam /
GK20mmatvipu:343: Kapālī - nanv asmākam anṛtaṃ na vaktavyam iti samayaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:344: Pāśupataḥ - ubhayam apy upapannam / ko {'tra : om. D} nirṇayopāyaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:345: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - buddhavaaṇaṃ pamāṇīkaraanto bhikkhū surābhāaṇaṃ gaṇhadi tti ko ettha hedū / [{bho G} buddhavacanaṃ pramāṇīkurvan bhikṣuḥ surābhājanaṃ gṛhṇātīti ko 'tra hetuḥ /]
GK20mmatvipu:346: Pāśupataḥ - nahi pratijñāmātreṇa hetuvādinaḥ siddhir asti /
GK20mmatvipu:349: Devasomā - bhaavaṃ! edassa hatthe civarāntappacchādidaṃ kavālaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:352: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - bho bhaavaṃ! edaṃ kavālaṃ ṇa parakeraaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:357: Kapālī - paśyantu paśyantu māheśvarāḥ kāpālikena {kapāline KaAF} kṛtam anyāyyam asya bhadantasya sādhuvṛttatāṃ ca /
GK20mmatvipu:358: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - ādiṇṇādāṇā veramaṇaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ / {... (iti punas tad eva paṭhati /)
GK20mmatvipu:361: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - haddhi / {lajjitavve : udidavve C} kāle ṇaccadi /
GK20mmatvipu:363: Kapālī - āḥ ko nṛtyati / (sarvato vilokya {ātmagatam R} /)
GK20mmatvipu:365: janita H}kutūhalamalayānilaprayuktāyā dhruvam asya nṛttabuddhiḥ prītilatāyā vilasiteṣu /
GK20mmatvipu:366: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - bhaavaṃ! keṇa kāraṇeṇa edaṃ ṇa lakkhīadi / bho ācikkhadu bhaavaṃ / imassa aaṃ vaṇṇo /
GK20mmatvipu:367: [{bho G} bhagavan! kena kāraṇenaitan na lakṣyate / bhoḥ ācaṣṭāṃ bhagavān / asyāyaṃ varṇaḥ /]
GK20mmatvipu:368: Kapālī - kim atra vaktavyam / nanu mayā dṛṣṭam / kākād api kṛṣṇam idaṃ kapālam /
GK20mmatvipu:369: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - teṇa hi edaṃ mamakeraaṃ ti saaṃ eva abbhuvagadaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:370: [tena hy etan madīyam iti svayam evābhyupagatam /]
GK20mmatvipu:371: Kapālī - satyam abhyupagataṃ tava varṇāntarakaraṇe naipuṇyam /
GK20mmatvipu:379: tvāṃ prāptaṃ syāt kathaṃ nāma kapālam akaṣāyitam // 16 //
GK20mmatvipu:380_0: Devasomā - hā hadahmi mandabhāā / savvalakkhaṇasampaṇṇadāe kamalāsaṇasīsakavālāṇubhāvassa
GK20mmatvipu:380_1: puṇṇamāsisomadaṃsaṇassa ṇiccasurāgandhiṇo edassa maliṇapaḍasaṃsaggeṇa ia īdisī avitthā
GK20mmatvipu:382: om. G} paurṇamāsīsomadarśanasya nityasurāgandhina etasya malinapaṭasaṃsargeṇeyam īdṛśy avasthā saṃvṛttā /]
GK20mmatvipu:383: Kapālī - priye! alaṃ santāpena / punaḥ śucir bhaviṣyati / śrūyante hi mahānti bhūtāni prāyaścittair apanītakalmaṣāṇi bhavanti / {tathā hi : yathā C} -
GK20mmatvipu:386: nātho 'pi tridivaukasāṃ triśirasaṃ tvaṣṭus tanūjaṃ purā
GK20mmatvipu:387: hatvā yajñaśatena śāntadurito bheje punaḥ puṇyatām // 17 //
GK20mmatvipu:391: bhodu C} vaṇṇo dāva mae kido / imassa saṇṭhāṇaparimāṇaṃ keṇa ṇimmidaṃ / [bhoḥ! varṇas tāvan mayā kṛtaḥ / asya saṃsthānaparimāṇaṃ {kena nirmitaṃ : tāvat katham G} /]
GK20mmatvipu:393: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - kettiaṃ velaṃ bhavantaṃ akkosāmi / gaṇhadu bhaavaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:395: Kapālī - nūnam evaṃ buddhenāpi dānaparimitā pūritā /
GK20mmatvipu:396: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - evaṃ {gade : kide F} {kiṃ S : ki U} dāṇiṃ me saraṇaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:399: Pāśupataḥ - nāyaṃ vyavahāro mayā paricchettuṃ śakyate / tad adhikaraṇam eva yāsyāmaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:400: Devasomā - bhagavan! yady evaṃ, namaḥ kapālāya /
GK20mmatvipu:403_0: Devasomā - eso uṇa aṇeavihārabhoasamadhigadavittasañcao jahākāmaṃ adhikaraṇakāruṇiāṇaṃ
GK20mmatvipu:403_1: muhāṇi pūreduṃ pāredi / ahmāaṃ puṇa ahicammabhūdimattavibhavassa dariddakavāliassa
GK20mmatvipu:403_2: pariāriāṇaṃ ko etta vibhavo adhikaraṇaṃ pavisiduṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:407: } mukhāni pūrayituṃ pārayati / asmākaṃ punar ahicarmabhūtimātra{vibhavasya :
GK20mmatvipu:408: vibhava G}daridrakāpālikasya paricārikāṇāṃ ko 'tra vibhavo 'dhikaraṇaṃ praveṣṭum / ]
GK20mmatvipu:414: Kapālī - kṛtam anena / kutaś cid api nyāyya{nyāya BCE}vṛtter bhayaṃ nāsti /
GK20mmatvipu:416: D} bho bhaavaṃ! tumaṃ dāva aggado hohi {hodu ABCF} / [bho bhagavan! tvaṃ tāvad agrato bhava /]
GK20mmatvipu:421_0: Unmattakaḥ - eśo eśo duṭṭhakukkule / śullamaṃśagabbhaṃ kavālaṃ gaṇhia dhāvaśi / dāśīevutta!
GK20mmatvipu:421_1: kahiṃ gamiśśiśi / eśo dāṇiṃ kavālaṃ ṇikkhivia maṃ khāyidukāmo ahimuhaṃ āhāvai / (diśo vilokya)
GK20mmatvipu:422: imiṇā patthaleṇa dantāṇi śe bhañjiśśaṃ / kahaṃ kavālaṃ ujjhia palāaśi / ummatte duṭṭhakukkule īdiśeṇa {ṇāma :
GK20mmatvipu:423_0: om. F} śūlattaṇeṇa mae śaha vi lośaṃ kaleśi / gāmaśūgalaṃ āluhia gagaṇam uppadideṇa
GK20mmatvipu:423_1: śāgaleṇa paḍipañjia lāvaṇaṃ balā gahīde śakkaśude timiṅgale / ai elaṇḍalukkha! kiṃ
GK20mmatvipu:423_2: bhaṇāśi / aliaṃ aliaṃ tti / ṇaṃ eśe muśalaśamaviśālalambahatthe daddule me śakkhī /
GK20mmatvipu:424: evvaṃ dāva D} kaliśśaṃ / kukkilakhādiaśeśaṃ maṃśakhaṇḍaṃ khādiśśaṃ / (khādan bhrāntaḥ /)
GK20mmatvipu:425: hā hā mālido mhi, bappheṇa mālido mhi / (ruditvā vilokya)
GK20mmatvipu:427: duṭṭhadālaā! jaśśa vā kaśśa vā {bhāuṇeo S : bhāaṇeo U} khu ahaṃ,
GK20mmatvipu:428: bhīmaśeṇaśśa ghaṭukkao via / avi a śuṇātha -
GK20mmatvipu:432: muheṇa muñcāmi ahaṃ {maholae S : maholaye U} // 19 //
GK20mmatvipu:433: kahaṃ maṃ bāhanti / paśīdantu paśīdantu dālaabhaṭṭā / imaśśa maṃśakhaṇḍaśśa kālaṇādo mā maṃ bāheha / (agrato vilokya /)
GK20mmatvipu:434: eśe khu amhāṇaṃ āālie śūlanandī / {jāva S : jāvaṃ U} ṇaṃ uvaśappāmi / (iti dhāvati /)
GK20mmatvipu:436_0: dhāvati G} / dāsyāḥputra! kutra gamiṣyasi / eṣa idānīṃ kapālaṃ nikṣipya māṃ khāditukāmo
GK20mmatvipu:436_1: 'bhimukham ādhāvati / anena prastareṇa dantān asya bhaṅkṣyāmi / kathaṃ kapālam ujjhitvā
GK20mmatvipu:436_2: palāyase / unmatto duṣṭakukkura īdṛśena nāma śūratvena {saha G} mayā {sahāpi roṣaṃ :
GK20mmatvipu:444: ayi eraṇḍavṛkṣa! kiṃ bhaṇasi / alīkam alīkam iti / {nanv eṣa musalasamaviśālalambahasto darduro me sākṣī :
GK20mmatvipu:445: hanumata eṣā musalasamaviśālalambahaste dardure me śaktiḥ G} / {athavā trailokyaviditaparākramasya sākṣiṇā kiṃ kāryam :
GK20mmatvipu:446: athavā kiṃ mama trailokyaviditaparākramasya śaktyāḥ kāryam G} / evaṃ {kariṣyāmi :
GK20mmatvipu:447: tāvat kariṣye G} / kukkurakhāditaśeṣaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍaṃ khādiṣyāmi / hā hā {bāṣpeṇa mārito 'smi :
GK20mmatvipu:448: mālito 'smi bāṣpeṇa G} / ka eṣa māṃ tāḍayasi / {duṣṭadārakā :
GK20mmatvipu:449: duṣṭadārakabhartāra! vāsudevasya bhāgi G}! yasya vā kasya vā bhāgineyaḥ khalv ahaṃ,
GK20mmatvipu:450: bhīmasenasya ghaṭotkaca iva / api ca śṛṇutha -
GK20mmatvipu:452: śataṃ piśācā udare {vahanti : vasanti G} me /
GK20mmatvipu:456: punar api māṃ tāḍayanti G} / prasīdantu prasīdantu dārakabhartāraḥ! asya māṃsakhaṇḍasya kāraṇād mā māṃ {bādhadhvam :
GK20mmatvipu:457: tāḍayatha G} / eṣa khalv asmākam ācāryaḥ śūranandī / yāvad enam {upasarpāmi : upaharāmi G(15)}/]
GK20mmatvipu:458: Pāśupata - aye! ayam unmattakaḥ ita evābhivartate / ya eṣaḥ -
GK20mmatvipu:460: keśair uddhatabhasma{pāṃsu : pāṇḍu D}nicayair nirmālya{mālākulaiḥ : mālāvṛtaḥ CE : mālāvṛtaiḥ D} /
GK20mmatvipu:465: mahāśāhuṇo caṇḍālakukkulaśśa śaāśādo ahiadaṃ edaṃ {kavālaṃ : om. D} paḍigaṇhadu bhaavaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:466: [yāvad enam upasarpāmi / mahāsādhoś caṇḍālakukkurasya sakāśād {mayā G} adhigatam etat kapālaṃ pratigṛhṇātu {bhagavān :
GK20mmatvipu:474: Unmattakaḥ - (kapālinam upagamya kapālaṃ bhūmau nikṣipya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayoḥ patitvā)
GK20mmatvipu:475: mahādeva! kalīadu paśādo / eśo de añjalī /
GK20mmatvipu:480: Kapālī - bhagavatprasādāt punar api kapālī saṃvṛttaḥ / (grahītum icchati /)
GK20mmatvipu:485: {eṣa : hanta C : kaṣṭam eṣa E} yamapuruṣo me jīvitaṃ harati / abhyavapadyetāṃ bhavantau /
GK20mmatvipu:486: Ubhau - hodu / amhe de sahāā homa /
GK20mmatvipu:493: Unmattakaḥ - mūḍha! ki ṇa pekkhaśi, śuvaṇṇabhāaṇaṃ khu edaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:494: [mūḍha! kiṃ na paśyasi, suvarṇabhājanaṃ khalv etat /]
GK20mmatvipu:496: Unmattakaḥ - ediṇā śuvaṇṇavaṇṇapaḍāvudeṇa śuvaṇṇakārāvuttaeṇa kidaṃ tti bhaavaṃ / śuvaṇṇabhāaṇaṃ tti bhaṇāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:498: kāreṇa G} kṛtam iti bhagavan / suvarṇabhājanam iti bhaṇāmi /]
GK20mmatvipu:501: Unmattakaḥ - ummattao tti bahuśo edaṃ śaddaṃ śuṇomi / edaṃ gaṇhia daliśehi ummattaaṃ / (kapāline kapālaṃ prayachati /)
GK20mmatvipu:502: [{unmattaka iti bahuśa etaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇomi / etad gṛhītvā darśayonmattakam / :
GK20mmatvipu:503: yuṣmākaṃ unmattakā / yuṣmākaṃ putrā unmattakāḥ / etad dattvā darśayāmi unmattakatvam / G}]
GK20mmatvipu:504: Kapālī - (kapālaṃ gṛhītvā) ayam idānīṃ kuḍyenāntarhitaḥ / śīghram anugamyatām /
GK20mmatvipu:508: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - aho acchariaṃ / paravakkhassa lābheṇa ahaṃ parituṭṭho hmi /
GK20mmatvipu:512: maheśvare bhagavati bhaktir {asti : astu C} me /
GK20mmatvipu:513: tirohitaḥ sa tu sahasā sukhena nas
GK20mmatvipu:514: tvam adya yat kuśali kapāla dṛśyase // 21 //
GK20mmatvipu:515: Devasomā - bhaavaṃ! candasamāgadaṃ via paosaṃ bhaavantaṃ pekkhantīe ajja āṇandadī via me diṭṭhī /
GK20mmatvipu:516: [bhagavan! candrasamāgatam iva pradoṣaṃ bhagavantaṃ paśyatyā adyānandatīva me dṛṣṭiḥ /]
GK20mmatvipu:520: satyam etat / nāsty adoṣavatāṃ bhayam iti / {yad :
GK20mmatvipu:522: om. D} vyāghramukhāt {katham api E} paribhraṣṭaḥ / (prakāśam /)
GK20mmatvipu:523: yāvad aham idānīm eva suhṛdabhyudayakṛtam ānandaṃ purodhāya bhagavataḥ {pūrva : pūrvaṃ KaA(17)
GK20mmatvipu:533: Kapālī - bho nāgasena! yan mayāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ, tat prasannahṛdayaṃ tvam icchāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:534: Śākyabhikṣu - kiṃ edaṃ pi abbhatthaṇīaṃ / kiṃ de piaṃ karemi /
GK20mmatvipu:535: [kim etad apy abhyarthanīyam / kiṃ te priyaṃ karomi /]
GK20mmatvipu:536: Kapālī - yadi me bhagavān prasannaḥ, kim ataḥ param aham icchāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:542: Kapālī - priye devasome! gacchāvas tāvat / : om. (no siglum)(18)}
GK20mmatvipu:544: śaśvad bhūtyai prajānāṃ vahatu vidhihutām āhutiṃ jātavedā
GK20mmatvipu:545: vedān viprā bhajantāṃ surabhiduhitaro bhūridohā bhavantu /
GK20mmatvipu:546: udyuktaḥ sveṣu dharmeṣv ayam api vigatavyāpad ācandratāraṃ
GK20mmatvipu:552: (1) Note by Sastri, also printed in Unni's edition: karotīty adhyāhartavyam /
GK20mmatvipu:557_0: argheti mūlyaprāptyarthako dhātuḥ / bahu iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam / bahu arghanti bahu
GK20mmatvipu:557_1: mūlyaṃ prāpnuvanti ślāghām analpāṃ labhanta iti yāvat / yaḥ svayaṃ guṇottarasūktiratnanidhiḥ
GK20mmatvipu:558: pratyuta ślāghata eva kevalam iti tātparyam / yasminn iti vaiṣayike sāmīpike vādhikaraṇe saptamī /
GK20mmatvipu:559: (4) Or does H omit pātrahastaḥ only? Unni's note is ambiguous.
GK20mmatvipu:560: (5) Or is it upādhaassa in K? The note in my edition is not clearly ligible.
GK20mmatvipu:561: (6) Unni does not make clear what the akṣara gha is substituted for or where it is inserted.
GK20mmatvipu:563: (8) Brackets in both Unni's and Sastri's editions.
GK20mmatvipu:566: (11) Unni records the very same gṛhṇātu as a variant.
GK20mmatvipu:567: (12) According to Unni. Sastri does not record any variant.

GK20mmatvipu:573: gaganam utpatitena mayā śvagaṇena saha airāvataṃ pratibhañjya gṛhītaḥ sasutas timiṅgila iti unmattapralāpaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:574: (15) G comments: pūjayāmi; asya nayiṣye kapālam iti śeṣaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:577: (18) No siglum added in Unni's note.
